### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=-40.5, y=40.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=-40.5, y=40.5) 

### Electricity generator at position(x=1.5, y=1.0)
Consists of boiler(position x=1.5, y=1.0), boiler(position x=1.5, y=3.0), offshore pump(position x=-7.5, y=25.5), offshore pump(position x=-18.5, y=27.5), offshore pump(position x=-16.5, y=26.5), offshore pump(position x=-13.5, y=26.5), offshore pump(position x=-3.5, y=27.5), offshore pump(position x=-1.5, y=28.5), offshore pump(position x=0.5, y=30.5), offshore pump(position x=1.5, y=32.5), boiler(position x=-24.5, y=32.0)

### Water supply at position(x=-7.5, y=25.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=-7.5, y=25.5), offshore pump(position x=-18.5, y=27.5), offshore pump(position x=-16.5, y=26.5), offshore pump(position x=-13.5, y=26.5), offshore pump(position x=-3.5, y=27.5), offshore pump(position x=-1.5, y=28.5), offshore pump(position x=0.5, y=30.5), offshore pump(position x=1.5, y=32.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors when boiler is not out of fuel
- Check the fuel level of the boiler before attempting to insert coal
### Errors when offshore pump is not working
- Check the connection points and fluid systems of the offshore pump before attempting to use it
### Errors when steam engine is not connected to power network
- Check the connection points of the steam engine and ensure it is connected to a power network before attempting to use it
### Errors when pipe group is empty
- Check the fluid system and connection points of the pipe group before attempting to use it
### Errors when generator is not connected to power network
- Check the connection points of the generator and ensure it is connected to a power network before attempting to use it
